packages.name: Dream World Super Visa
packages.desc:
Dream World Super Visa

Entry Ticket Prices:
• Till 31 Oct 2025: 800 THB (Adult/Child)
• From 01 Nov 2025: 1000 THB (Adult/Child)

• 150 THB (11:30 AM – 2 PM)

Includes:
• 26 rides, unlimited rides
• 4D, Alien, Bump Car, Haunted House
• Snow Town, Go-Kart, Bicycle Boat, Bump Boat

Excludes:
• Carnival Games

Child Policy:

Transfers:

• SUV (3-4 pax): 2000 THB
• Van (5-10 pax): 2400 THB

Open: 10 AM – 5 PM
MM Holidays Contact: +66 875 178 432 / +66 823 221 031

packages.name: Space & Time Cube – Immersive Museum

• Adult: 620 THB (798 THB)
• Child: 520 THB (648 THB)

• 300 THB (399 THB)

• Adult ticket: Height > 140 cm
• Child ticket & senior 60+: Below 140 cm

• Child under 80 cm: Free

Includes:
• 20+ photo spots
• Rail Cinema: 8 stories
• VR Hall: 1 game per card

packages.name: Mahanakhon SkyWalk – 74th & 78th Floor

• Drink Package: 1100 / 1300 (1 soft drink)
• Above the Clouds: 1250 / 1450 (1 drink at SkyBeach 78F)

• Junior (3–12): 550 / 550
• Senior (60+): 550 / 550

Remarks:
